title: Benefits & Services-College of Economic and Social Development
content: Thank you for your interest in, and support of, Nankai University's College of Economic and Social Development Alumni Association. We will give full play to the role of the alumni association as a link between alumni, promoting friendship, and promoting mutual assistance and common prosperity, and continue to provide high-quality and efficient services to all alumni of the college. We look forward to your participation! Services for alumni Sharing of various academic lecture resources from Nankai University Assistance with joining the appropriate grade associations and industry branches of the association. Participation and assistance in various alumni activities of schools and colleges
